description: If an exception happens to occur in ProxyCallback __call__(), the exception is eaten.  Furthermore, no more messages are processed from the rabbit queue.
title: Exceptions in rpc's ProxyCallback __call__ are eaten

comments.content: If an exception happens to occur in ProxyCallback __call__(), the exception is eaten.  Furthermore, no more messages are processed from the rabbit queue.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbehrens
